page.title: 19BEN'S VIEWS ON SILVER END
page.content: I like Silver End,which was built in 1926 for the Crittall workers and has been growing ever since.The Diamond Jubilee will be celebrated next year. My family moved to our detached house, from Liverpool,last year.There are 3 churches in this village and I serve at St.Mary's,the catholic church.In my class at school there are 3rd.and 4th. years and it is smaller than the one I used to go to,but I like this one more Mum likes the handy Supermarket and shops and friendly people.There is a good social club and a library and big fields,for me to play football.I go to scouts and play with my friends in the park, where there's a pond and swings. I have a nice big garden and there are more flowers,trees and grass than in Liverpool.It is not far to the country side.It's quieter and there's more space and fresh air.I'm glad we moved.
